alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 2:33AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The next weather system will make inroads into the region through the course of the day. Precipitation will fall as a combination of moderate to heavy snow and freezing rain. Strong north northeast winds are also anticipated, leading to blowing and drifting snow. The result will be rapidly deteriorating travel conditions and the potential for power outages that will last through the night and the better part of Tuesday. Improved weather conditions will set in Tuesday night and Wednesday morning at the earliest. Temperatures will remain around freezing through the course of the day, with the warmest air in far eastern South Dakota and western Minnesota, with readings tipping into the 20s tonight.
